name: Texas Science Bowl 2026 Invitational
logistics: Virtual tournament. Opening Ceremony at 10:30 AM on January 18, 2026.

registration.instructions: Fill out the form once per team (rather than once per school). Payment is not due until after the registration deadline, so we can notify all teams who actually have a spot. 48 teams will participate.

format.summary: 48 teams compete in 8 divisions of 6 teams each for round-robin play, followed by a 16-team double-elimination bracket

phases.name: Round-Robin
phases.description: 5 round-robin rounds against all other teams in division. Teams receive 2 points per match won and 1 point per match drawn. Top 2 teams per division by index (1000 * match points + PPG) advance.

phases.name: Double-Elimination Bracket
phases.description: 16 teams seeded by index into double-elimination bracket. Continues until all but one team has lost two games.
